segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink just gushing water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's oblivious, polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's soaking her shoes and the floor; it's going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not hearing the splash or seeing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now these kids are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching way too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he's going to crash down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, reaching up like she can't wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies behind her back; what mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined from all that water streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the whole chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or a big scolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
